titleStmt.title: A godlie treatise, intituled the view and down-fall of pride Wherein is declared the cause of Babylons destruction, and Nabuchadnezzars subuersion. Set forth by William Wheatley Maister of Art, and preacher of Gods word.
titleStmt.author: Whately, William, 1583-1639.

publicationStmt.publisher: By Thomas Creed, for Iohn Deane and Iohn Baily, and are to be solde at his shop, at the doore of the Office of the sixe Clarkes in Chancerie Lane,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in Emmanuel College (University of Cambridge). Library.

place.placeName: his shop, at the doore of the Office of the sixe Clarkes in Chancerie Lane
